body: Workshops are starting soon! Dance for Gymnastics, Strength for Gymnastics, Bars and Beam for Levels 1 to 4!
To sign up online, log into the parent portal through the Login/Register link in the top right-hand corner.  Then click on 'Summer Workshops' on the left.
blogPosts.header: Summer Workshops for ages 7-14 start June 19!

body: Tuesdays & Thursdays 6-8pm. $120 per month for one class per week, $180 for both.  This is a coach-led practice with flexibility for the gymnasts to work on their individual skills and routines. Call, email, or sign up through our parent portal by using the 'Log In' link in the top right-hand corner.

Now offering 3-year-old gymnastics classes! Sign up for a Preschool class for ages 3-4 1/2 or a Kindergym class for ages 4 1/2 to 5.  Students practice strength and agility exercises designed for further progression on floor, bars, beam, vault, and rings.
